mapper.sql: select stud_id, name, email, dob, phone from students
insert into students (stud_id, name, email, phone, dob ) values(#{studId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{dob})
mapper.select: select stud_id, name, email, dob, phone from students
select stud_id, name, email, dob, phone from students where stud_id = #{studId}
select stud_id, name, email, dob, phone, substring(phone, 1, 3) as f, substring(phone, 5, 3) as m, substring(phone, 9, 4) as l from students where stud_id=#{studId};
